text: Hi <@U06M2E0N9HD>, is this in reference to a HubSpot listing? This isn't the appropriate place to ask about this - this Slack Community is dedicated to developers outside of HubSpot, who are building or working on HubSpot projects, to collaborate. If this is a HubSpot role, your best bet is to apply at <https://www.HubSpot.com/careers>
